en.name: Before the Tutorial Mission Starts
en.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by {{20//25//30//35//40%}}. When the wearer attacks DEF-reduced enemies, regenerates {{4//5//6//7//8}} Energy.

zh.name: 新手任务开始前
zh.description: 使装备者的效果命中提高{{20//25//30//35//40%}}。当装备者攻击防御力被降低的敌方目标后，恢复{{4//5//6//7//8}}点能量。
